DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Sleep Disturbance Sleep116 Past 7 Days Refreshing Sleep Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how refreshing their sleep was in the past 7 days, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sleep Disturbance Subordinate Domain Past Week Refreshing Sleep Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health._The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep._The most recent week, including today._A question about whether an individual's sleep is or was refreshing._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Physical Health Domain Sleep Disturbance Subordinate Domain
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.:The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses the status of an individual's physical health.

The collection of PROMIS item scales that assess perceptions of sleep quality, sleep depth, and restoration associated with sleep; perceived difficulties and concerns with getting to sleep or staying asleep; and perceptions of the adequacy of and satisfaction with sleep.

Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about whether an individual's sleep is or was refreshing.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
A question about whether an individual's sleep is or was refreshing.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group, 2008-2012
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance A011401 study in Rave per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 2/17/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing an individual's experiences related to sleep from 1: Very much, to 5: Not at all.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of strong agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer describing a fairly large amount or extent.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of partial agreement.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of weak agreement.
A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created for ECOG-ACRIN study in Rave. mc 5/4/15

ClassificationSchemes.longName: PROMIS Item Banks (Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System)

DataElement.origin: PROMIS:Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System, PROMIS Health Organization and PROMIS Cooperative Group
